column4: hellow, I just installed lamp-server, using tasksel, on ubuntu 10.10 netbook remix (not efficient, but eh), now I enabled userdir with a2enmod , enabled the php, but I still get 403 errors when trying to browse to the site, I tried various chmod settings, changed group to www-data, any clues?
no expoert but dont you need to use ~name ?
yes, it's what I'm trying, it worked fine a week ago or so on an ubuntu vm, not sure why it fails now
